eligible to create bonds for the operator."},"deposit(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Add the provided value to operator's pool available for bonding."},"freeBond(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Releases authorizeSortitionPoolContract(address,a.details: Only operator's authorizer can call this function.

availableUnbondedValue(address,address,a.details: Implements function expected by sortition pools' IBonding interface.

params.bondCreator: Address authorized to create a bond.

availableUnbondedValue(address,address,a.return: Amount of authorized wei deposit available for bonding.

params.holder: Address of the holder of the bond.

bondAmount(address,address,uint256).return: Amount of wei in the selected bond.

createBond(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Function can be executed only by authorized contract. Reference ID should be unique for holder and operator.

params.holder: Address of the holder of the bond.
params.operator: Address of the operator to bond.
params.referenceID: Reference ID used to track the bond by holder.

deauthorizeSortitionPoolContract(address.details: Only operator's authorizer can call this function.

freeBond(address,uint256).details: Function requires that caller is the holder of the bond which is being released.

reassignBond(address,uint256,address,uin.details: Function requires that a caller is the current holder of the bond which is being reassigned.

params.newHolder: Address of the new holder of the bond.
params.newReferenceID: New reference ID to register the bond.

seizeBond(address,uint256,uint256,addres.details: Function requires that a caller is the holder of the bond which is being seized.

params.destination: Address to send the amount to.

authorizeSortitionPoolContract(address,a.notice: Authorizes sortition pool for the provided operator. Operator's authorizers need to authorize individual sortition pools per application since they may be interested in participating only in a subset of keep types used by the given application.

authorizerOf(address).notice: Gets the authorizer for the specified operator address.

availableUnbondedValue(address,address,a.notice: Returns the amount of wei the operator has made available for bonding and that is still unbounded. If the operator doesn't exist or bond creator is not authorized as an operator contract or it is not authorized by the operator or there is no secondary authorization for the provided sortition pool, function returns 0.

beneficiaryOf(address).notice: Gets the beneficiary for the specified operator address.

bondAmount(address,address,uint256).notice: Returns value of wei bonded for the operator.

createBond(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Create bond for the given operator, holder, reference and amount.

deauthorizeSortitionPoolContract(address.notice: Deauthorizes sortition pool for the provided operator. Authorizer may deauthorize individual sortition pool in case the operator should no longer be eligible for work selection and the application represented by the sortition pool should no longer be eligible to create bonds for the operator.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Add the provided value to operator's pool available for bonding.

freeBond(address,uint256).notice: Releases the bond and moves the bond value to the operator's unbounded value pool.

hasSecondaryAuthorization(address,addres.notice: Checks if the sortition pool has been authorized for the provided operator by its authorizer.

isAuthorizedForOperator(address,address).notice: Checks if operator contract has been authorized for the provided operator.

reassignBond(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Reassigns a bond to a new holder under a new reference.

seizeBond(address,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Seizes the bond by moving some or all of the locked bond to the provided destination address.

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws amount from operator's value available for bonding.

userdoc.notice: Contract holding deposits from keeps' operators.
